```{r}
lambda= 0.8
```


```{r}
set.seed(876)
T=10
n_jumps=lambda*T
n = (0:n_jumps)
t = cumsum(c(0,rexp(n_jumps,lambda)))
while (max(t) <= T){
  n = c(n, max(n)+1)
  t = c(t, max(t) + rexp(1,lambda))
}
if (max(t) > T){
  t[length(t)]=T
  n[length(n)]=n[length(t)]-1
}
plot(t, n, type="s")
```
